title: Really Tall Guy With Nothing Else Going For Him

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose to guard anyone that is a higher number than you on the player list.
- Jump up and slap the ceiling during the day. The host must send a message announcing this. (Max once a day)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If the player you are guarding is attacked by someone with a higher number than you on the player list, you fight off the attacker and deal a Powerful attack.
- If the player you are guarding is attacked by someone with a lower number than you on the player list, you save the person you are guarding but die in the process.
- You cannot be hung because the rope isn't high enough. You are available to vote for, but hanging you will not kill you and just cause the day to end.
